name: Ratatattack
description:
Use Left Mouse Button to MOVE, Use Right Mouse Button to ATTACK.

A submission to Weekly Game Jam with the theme "One Action".

This was supposedly submitted to Mini Game Jam but I got a little busy so I just joined another one. I asked my cousin Arnold Gecain to draw the character for this game. Also I'm joining other game jams that's why I didn't have much time to improve the game. This is just a prototype but still hope you enjoy.
